name: Pearly
description:
Pearly is a short puzzle-platformer made for the 2018 Mapcore door challenge.

I'm aware this entry is a little rough, but I've learned a tonne about UE4 along the way.

You may notice that there are areas in the map that look like they should contain something or lead somewhere. This is simply because I ran out of time to implement an easter egg I had planned. Sorry!

Many thanks to Mapcore for giving me an excuse to make something in this wonderful engine.

Oh, and thanks for playing!
